name: Chat with GPT
author: Qbein

sections.description:
Discover the power of ChatGPT, the top WordPress plugin for creating captivating chat experiences on your website.
Engage your visitors in meaningful conversations and boost user interaction with this versatile and user-friendly plugin. Get started today!

The Ultimate ChatGPT prompts compilation for your tasks

We offer you a collection of useful and correct prompts for various tasks.

Follow this link to investigate it: https://qbein.net/chat-with-gpt

CHECK IS SERVER COUNTRY SUPPORTED

Please check is your server location country supported by ChatGPT api. Supported countries and territories
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/chat-with-gpt directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Go to plugin settings page and put your chatGPT apikey and configure plugin
sections.faq:
If AI do not answer on question

Please check that you put correct and working apikey in apikey field in plugin settings page. Also check is your server IP country not in ban list (see description for check link)

What happened when user used all requests by limit (per day)

He got submit email form to get more answers from site owner

Why I do not see chat on site page

Check that you are logged in or checkbox Show chat for guest users on plugin settings page is unchecked (to show chat for guest users)
